scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains letters from Theodore Dreiser to James B. Pond and Sallie Kussell.

did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to James B. Pond 7 October 1932

scopecontent.p: Theodore Dreiser, New York, to James B. Pond, New York. Thinks he will accept Boston engagement; asks for date of engagement; believes he will not be moving.

did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to James B. Pond 31 October 1932

scopecontent.p: Theodore Dreiser, New York, to James B. Pond, New York. Thinks a more general announcement would be a good idea; awaits word on Boston lecture.

did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to James B. Pond 29 May 1933

scopecontent.p: Theodore Dreiser, New York, to James B. Pond, New York. Writes that he cannot make definite plans as he does not feel well and would not undertake lecturing in the summer.

did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to Sallie Kussell 22 July 1923

scopecontent.p: Theodore Dreiser, Port Jervis, to Sallie Kussell. Gives address at Southeast corner of Riverside Drive and 84th Street; writes that his absence is unavoidable.

did.unittitle: Letter from Theodore Dreiser to Sallie Kussell 29 July 1923
